info.name: Unicharm EMS - Complete API Collection
info.description: Unified API collection for Unicharm Employee Management System - Includes both SuperAdmin and Employee modules

request.description: Login for accountants (use username in email field)

Toggle soft delete status of an employee
Get all accountants using stored procedure USP_GetAccountant
Get complete dashboard data (all stored procedures executed in parallel)
Get meetings for user using USP_GetMeetingsForUser
Get tickets for assignee using stored procedure USP_GetTicketForAssignee
